languages.text: "Мое командование поручило уведомить вас, что весьма ценит союзнические связи с династией фон Валанциус. Пусть нам и не удалось выстроить мощный альянс на сегодняшний день, оно верит, что в будущем мы сможем {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}укрепить наши договоры{/d} и принести в Простор свет Империума. Однажды".

"My command has tasked me with letting you know they strongly value our allyship with House von Valancius. Although at this time, we have not managed to build a powerful alliance, they believe that we will be able to {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}strengthen our treaties{/d} and bring the light of the Imperium to the Expanse going forward. Someday."
languages.original_text: "Мое командование поручило уведомить вас, что весьма ценит союзнические связи с династией фон Валанциус. Пусть нам и не удалось выстроить мощный альянс на сегодняшний день, оно верит, что в будущем мы сможем {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}укрепить наши договоры{/d} и принести в Простор свет Империума. Однажды".

Although at this time, we have not managed to build a powerful alliance, they believe that we will be able to strengthen our treaties and bring the light of the Imperium to the Expanse going forward. Someday."
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: “我的指挥官让过告诉您，他们非常重视与冯·瓦兰修斯家族的盟友关系。尽管我们目前并没有建立强大的联盟，但他们相信，有朝一日，我们必定会{d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}加强我们之间的关系{/d}，将帝国之光带到整个科罗努斯扩区。”
languages.original_text: "My command has tasked me with letting you know they strongly value our allyship with House von Valancius. Although at this time, we have not managed to build a powerful alliance, they believe that we will be able to {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}strengthen our treaties{/d} and bring the light of the Imperium to the Expanse going forward. Someday."

traits.locale_text: “我的指挥官让过告诉您，他们非常重视与冯·瓦兰修斯家族的盟友关系。尽管我们目前并没有建立强大的联盟，但他们相信，有朝一日，我们必定会加强我们之间的关系，将帝国之光带到整个科罗努斯扩区。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: 「私の指揮官から、フォン・ヴァランシウス家との同盟を大いに評価している事をお伝えするよう命じられました。しかしこの時代のせいで、強力な同盟関係を構築できていません。彼らは、私たちがきっと{d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}条約を強化{/d}し、帝国の光をエクスパンスにもたらすことができると信じているのです」
languages.original_text: "My command has tasked me with letting you know they strongly value our allyship with House von Valancius. Although at this time, we have not managed to build a powerful alliance, they believe that we will be able to {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}strengthen our treaties{/d} and bring the light of the Imperium to the Expanse going forward. Someday."

traits.locale_text: 「私の指揮官から、フォン・ヴァランシウス家との同盟を大いに評価している事をお伝えするよう命じられました。しかしこの時代のせいで、強力な同盟関係を構築できていません。彼らは、私たちがきっと{d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}条約を強化{/d}し、帝国の光をエクスパンスにもたらすことができると信じているのです」
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: «Mi mando me ha encargado hacerle saber que valoran mucho nuestra alianza con la casa von Valancius. Aunque en este momento no hayamos logrado construir una alianza poderosa, creen que podemos {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}fortalecer nuestros tratados{/d} y llevar la luz del Imperium a la Extensión en un futuro. Algún día».
languages.original_text: "My command has tasked me with letting you know they strongly value our allyship with House von Valancius. Although at this time, we have not managed to build a powerful alliance, they believe that we will be able to {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}strengthen our treaties{/d} and bring the light of the Imperium to the Expanse going forward. Someday."

traits.locale_text: «Mi mando me ha encargado hacerle saber que valoran mucho nuestra alianza con la casa von Valancius. Aunque en este momento no hayamos logrado construir una alianza poderosa, creen que podemos fortalecer nuestros tratados y llevar la luz del Imperium a la Extensión en un futuro. Algún día».
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: "Ich soll Euch von meinen Befehlshabern ausrichten, dass ihnen unser Bündnis mit Haus Valancius sehr wichtig ist. Es ist uns zwar bisher nicht gelungen, eine mächtige Allianz aufzubauen, doch sie sind überzeugt, dass wir unsere {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}Abkommen in Zukunft intensivieren{/d} und das Licht des Imperiums in die gesamte Ausdehnung tragen können. Eines Tages."
languages.original_text: "My command has tasked me with letting you know they strongly value our allyship with House von Valancius. Although at this time, we have not managed to build a powerful alliance, they believe that we will be able to {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}strengthen our treaties{/d} and bring the light of the Imperium to the Expanse going forward. Someday."

traits.locale_text: "Ich soll Euch von meinen Befehlshabern ausrichten, dass ihnen unser Bündnis mit Haus Valancius sehr wichtig ist. Es ist uns zwar bisher nicht gelungen, eine mächtige Allianz aufzubauen, doch sie sind überzeugt, dass wir unsere Abkommen in Zukunft intensivieren und das Licht des Imperiums in die gesamte Ausdehnung tragen können. Eines Tages."
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: « Mes supérieurs m'ont chargé de vous faire savoir qu'ils tiennent en très haute estime cette alliance avec la maison von Valancius. Bien qu'elle demeure fragile, ils espèrent pouvoir un jour {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}renforcer les traités{/d} qui nous lient afin d'apporter la lumière de l'Imperium dans les Étendues. »
languages.original_text: "My command has tasked me with letting you know they strongly value our allyship with House von Valancius. Although at this time, we have not managed to build a powerful alliance, they believe that we will be able to {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}strengthen our treaties{/d} and bring the light of the Imperium to the Expanse going forward. Someday."

traits.locale_text: « Mes supérieurs m'ont chargé de vous faire savoir qu'ils tiennent en très haute estime cette alliance avec la maison von Valancius. Bien qu'elle demeure fragile, ils espèrent pouvoir un jour renforcer les traités qui nous lient afin d'apporter la lumière de l'Imperium dans les Étendues. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: "Komutanlarım beni, von Valancius Hanesi ile olan ittifakımıza ne kadar büyük değer verdiğimizi size iletmekle görevlendirdi. Her ne kadar bu kez güçlü bir ittifak kurmayı başaramamış olsak da ilerleyen dönemlerde {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}anlaşmalarımızı sağlamlaştırıp{/d} İmparatorluk'un ışığını Enginlik'e taşıyacağımıza olan inançları tam. Bir gün."
languages.original_text: "My command has tasked me with letting you know they strongly value our allyship with House von Valancius. Although at this time, we have not managed to build a powerful alliance, they believe that we will be able to {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}strengthen our treaties{/d} and bring the light of the Imperium to the Expanse going forward. Someday."

traits.locale_text: "Komutanlarım beni, von Valancius Hanesi ile olan ittifakımıza ne kadar büyük değer verdiğimizi size iletmekle görevlendirdi. Her ne kadar bu kez güçlü bir ittifak kurmayı başaramamış olsak da, ilerleyen dönemlerde {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Mid}anlaşmalarımızı sağlamlaştıracağımıza{/d} ve İmparatorluk'un ışığını Enginlik'e taşıyacağımıza olan inançları tam. Bir gün."
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor
